transport.question: I go beep beep! What am I?

hints.text: 👪 You can ride in me with your family!

transport.question: I float on the water. What am I?

hints.text: ⚓️ I can take you to faraway places!
🚢 People can ride me across the sea!

transport.question: I have two wheels and you can pedal me! What am I?

hints.text: 🦵 You use your legs to move me!
🔔 I have a bell that goes 'ring ring'!
👧 You can ride me in the park.

transport.question: I am big and yellow and take you to school. What am I?

hints.text: 🛑 I stop to let children on and off.
🚌 I am longer than a car!

transport.question: I fly in the sky and take people far away. What am I?

hints.text: ☁️ I am faster than a car!
💺 People sit in seats inside me.

transport.question: I go choo-choo on the tracks! What am I?

hints.text: 💨 I can carry lots of people.

transport.question: I help people who are sick. Wee woo! Wee woo!

hints.text: 🏥 I take people to the hospital.

transport.question: I carry many cars across the water. What am I?

hints.text: 📍 I connect two places separated by water.

transport.question: I take you up a mountain! What am I?

hints.text: ❄️ You might see snow where I go.

transport.question: I can fly to the moon! What am I?

weather.question: I fall from the sky, but I'm not a bird. I'm cold and wet. What am I?

hints.text: ☔ You need an umbrella when I fall.

weather.question: I am big and bright and hot. I shine in the sky. What am I?

hints.text: 😎 You need sunglasses when I'm out.
🌞 I come out during the day.

weather.question: I'm white and fluffy, and I float in the sky. Sometimes I bring rain. What am I?

hints.text: 🌧️ I can make the ground wet.

weather.question: I make the leaves dance in the trees. I can be strong or gentle. What am I?

hints.text: 🪁 You can fly a kite with me.

weather.question: I fall from the sky when it's cold, and I'm white and fluffy. I melt when it gets warm. What am I?

hints.text: 🧤 You wear gloves when I'm around.
☃️ You can build a snowman with me.

weather.question: After the rain, sometimes you see me in the sky. I have many colors. What am I?

hints.text: 🌈 I look like a colorful arc.
☀️ You need both rain and sun to see me.
🔴 I have red, yellow, and blue in me.

weather.question: I'm very loud, and I come with lightning. I make the sky rumble. What am I?

hints.text: 👂 You can hear me far away.
⚡ I follow a flash of light.

weather.question: I am bright and flash in the sky during a storm. You see me before you hear thunder. What am I?

hints.text: ⛈️ I come before the loud noise.

weather.question: Sometimes it rains, then freezes on the ground and trees. It's slippery and clear. What am I?
I am a very strong wind that spins around. I can pick things up. What am I?

hints.text: 🏠 You should go inside when I come.
